1.title: Grow Up and Be Men

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Another season begins in the Beaver County Youth Football Association, as players and coaches move up to the 12- and 13-year-old Midget Division.

2.title: Stay Away from the Wounded Dog

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: The rivalry of Aliquippa vs. Beaver Falls plays out on and off the field. After suffering their first loss in three seasons, Central Valley looks to get back into the win column.

3.title: I'm Just a Parent What Do I Know

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: A volunteer fireman turned coach struggles to connect with his players; Todd Alexander loses his cool under mounting pressures.

4.title: When the Rubber Meets the Road

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Aliquippa visits hallowed ground; a father tries to reconnect with his son; coaches with painful pasts share their stories; Central Valley takes on an undefeated opponent.

5.title: Spirit of Murder

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: The football field provides sanctuary after a tragic crime occurs; Sto-Rox and Black Hawk go head-to-head.

6.title: As Long as We Win We're Fine

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: The playoffs begin and Sto-Rox tries to hold it together in a critical game. Beaver Falls and Blackhawk match up in the quarter finals and a star player makes a triumphant return.

7.title: Kiss the Baby

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Four teams compete for the championship; Central Valley wants to avenge their only loss; Aliquippa dedicates their season to a fallen coach.

8.title: The City Is on Our Shoulders

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: A champion is crowned in Beaver County; Central Valley takes on Aliquippa; a former president visits.

1.title: God, Family, and Community

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: A new season of youth football kicks off in Beaver County, Pennsylvania as 15 teams and the towns they represent square off in the Beaver County Youth Football Association. In Texas, football may be a religion, but in Beaver County, PA, football is life.

2.title: Playing for Survival

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: An equipment robbery hits the already struggling Monaca Lil Indians organization hard as they attempt to rebound from a string of disappointing seasons, and Head Coach Moses Cox returns to Ambridge after a suspension for fighting with a parent.

3.title: Ongoing Ball Drop

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: A call to replace Head Coach Ricky Suman leads to an ugly incident at a Monaca parent�۪s meeting. And two unbeaten powerhouses in Ambridge and Central Valley square off for the first time, while Aliquippa looks to rebound from an early loss.

4.title: I Can't Stand the Bastards

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Added security is put in place at a youth football game as rival towns Aliquippa and Beaver Falls meet in a grudge match with a history of violence, and the Monaca Li'l Indians continue to struggle in the face of dwindling participation.

5.title: Love Change

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Monaca Head Coach Ricky Suman makes a controversial move to add more players to his roster, and a battle of unbeaten teams results in a serious injury on the field.

6.title: We All We Got. We All We Need.

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Aliquippa and Ambridge, two towns separated by only a bridge, bring a long history of bad blood and spirited competition to the youth football field. Meanwhile, Beaver Falls looks to continue their winning ways.

7.title: Like Oxygen

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: A town that's lost nearly everything rallies behind the one thing it has left: its youth football team. And the Blackhawk Li'l Cougars face a difficult test.

8.title: Piece of Gum on My Shoe

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Playoffs are underway in the BCYFL as youth teams from Ambridge, Blackhawk, and Alliquippa prepare to do battle in their first round match ups.

9.title: We're Not Going Home

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: A feud between a parent and coaches escalates as Blackhawk and Ambridge take the field in a win or go home playoff game.

10.title: They Think We're Broken

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: An awards banquet turns ugly when a disgruntled parent crosses the line, and Central Valley enters the playoffs looking to repeat as league champions.

11.title: You Still Loved

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: The pressure to win in Beaver County continues to grow as the final four teams enter the Semifinals of the BCYFL playoffs.

12.title: They're Gonna Eat You for Lunch

episode of.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: The football season comes to an end in Beaver County as a perennial powerhouse clashes with an up and coming underdog in a championship game for the ages.

locations: Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania, USA::(Beaver Falls Playing Field)
McKees Rocks, Pennsylvania, USA::(Sto-Rox Playing Field)
Monaca, Pennsylvania, USA::(Central Valley & Monaca Playing Fields)
imdb.plot outline: Western Pennsylvania, home of football legends. Follow six teams in the Beaver County Youth Football League in what was once the backbone of industrial America, where jobs have vanished, the bridges that connect communities rusted over, but everyone is still drawn together by a great tradition... football.
imdb.title: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country
akas: Friday Night Tykes: Steel Country (United States)
